text.div:
ParticipationTargetDirect

Target that is substantially present in the service and which is directly affected by the service action (includes consumed material, devices, etc.).

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ParticipationType where concept is-a DIR

name: ParticipationTargetDirect
description: Target that is substantially present in the service and which is directly affected by the service action (includes consumed material, devices, etc.).
